name: seconder
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone who makes a formal statement of support for a suggestion made by someone else during a meeting, so that there can be a discussion or vote: There was no seconder for the motion so it could not be debated. See
second
More examplesFewer examples His proposal failed to find a seconder. We have a motion proposed by Mr Connon. Is there a seconder?The names of the proposer and seconder will not be published and will remain confidential to the scrutineers.Only corporate members may participate in elections, either as candidate, proposer, seconder or voter. All the candidates had to be nominated with proposers and seconders and they all have election agents.
